Access our website and contact our law firm about our Virginia, Maryland and DC services, and obtain a free no obligation consultation about uncontested Virginia divorce by affidavit, criminal, traffic and major injury cases.-DEVICE COMPATIBILITY: Our app should be compatible with ALL Android devices running Android 1.6 and above, including the latest roms. Tablet downloads for this app, due to Google filtering rules, are not currently supported through Google Play but must be done from our developer web page using this link: http://www.easyvirginiadivorce.com/files/Easy-Virginia-Legal-Resources.apk and installed by allowing installation of apps from "unknown sources" in your security settings, when prompted to do so.-** Download our other app on Google Play: EASY VIRGINIA DIVORCE *
